original_title: Up From the Streets - New Orleans: The City of Music
overview: A film looking at the culture of New Orleans thru the lens of music. Hosted by Oscar nominee and 6-time Grammy Winner Terence Blanchard, the film tells the story of how music and culture intersected to create a distinct form of expression.
tagline: A look at the culture of New Orleans through the lens of music.
title: Up From the Streets - New Orleans: The City of Music
